column4: where do i set the options that i see in the 'right mouse'-menu in nautilus?
i don't like the trash at all, i'dd like to have 'delete file' directly (without moving it to trash first) in the menu.
in the file manager, edit > preferences, Behavior tab, check "Include a Delete command that bypasses Trash" ;)
thanks, that's what i was searching for ;-)
